languages.text: {n}Чорда насмешливо улыбается.{/n} "Это было бы любопытно. Надо ли мне напомнить, что не только тебя защищает {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патент{/g}? Было бы печально, если бы кто-то нарушил мои священные привилегии и презрел Его волю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Чорда насмешливо улыбается.{/n} "Это было бы любопытно. Надо ли мне напомнить, что не только тебя защищает Патент? Было бы печально, если бы кто-то нарушил мои священные привилегии и наплевал на Его волю".

languages.text: {n}She smiles mockingly.{/n} "That I would like to see. Must I remind you that you are not the only one who is protected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}? It would be a terrible shame if someone were to violate my sacred privileges and scorn His will."
languages.original_text: {n}Чорда насмешливо улыбается.{/n} "Это было бы любопытно. Надо ли мне напомнить, что не только тебя защищает {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патент{/g}? Было бы печально, если бы кто-то нарушил мои священные привилегии и презрел Его волю".

traits.locale_text: {n}She smiles mockingly.{/n} "That I would like to see. Must I remind you that you are not the only one who is protected by a Warrant? It would be a terrible shame if someone were to violate my sacred privileges and scorn His will."

{n}She smiles mockingly.{/n} "That I would like to see. Must I remind you that you are not the only one who is protected by a Warrant? It would be a terrible shame if someone were to violate my sacred privileges and scorn His will."

{n}She smiles mockingly.{/n} "That I would like to see. Must I remind you that you are not the only one who is protected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}? It would be a terrible shame if someone were to violate my sacred privileges and scorn His will."

{n}She smiles mockingly.{/n} "That I would like to see. Must I remind you that you are not the only one who is protected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}? It would be a terrible shame if someone were to violate my sacred privileges and scorn His will."

{n}She smiles mockingly.{/n} "That I would like to see. Must I remind you that you are not the only one who is protected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}? It would be a terrible shame if someone were to violate my sacred privileges and scorn His will."

languages.text: {n}インセンディアはおどけたように笑う。{/n}「望むところだ。思い出させてやろうか、{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}で守られているのはお前ひとりではない。私の聖なる特権を侵し、皇帝の意思をあざ笑うとは、とんだ恥知らずだな」
languages.original_text: {n}She smiles mockingly.{/n} "That I would like to see. Must I remind you that you are not the only one who is protected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}? It would be a terrible shame if someone were to violate my sacred privileges and scorn His will."

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアはおどけたように笑う。{/n}「望むところだ。思い出させてやろうか、{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}で守られているのはお前ひとりではない。私の聖なる特権を侵し、皇帝の意思をあざ笑うとは、とんだ恥知らずだな」

languages.text: {n}她露出了嘲弄的笑容。{/n}“那我倒是想见识见识。你并不是这里唯一一个受到{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}授状{/g}保护的人，这应该不用我提醒你吧？若是有人打算违逆神皇的意愿，挑战我的神圣特权，那恐怕就太令人遗憾了。”
languages.original_text: {n}She smiles mockingly.{/n} "That I would like to see. Must I remind you that you are not the only one who is protected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}? It would be a terrible shame if someone were to violate my sacred privileges and scorn His will."

traits.locale_text: {n}她露出了嘲弄的笑容。{/n}“那我倒是想见识见识。你并不是这里唯一一个受到{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}许可证{/g}保护的人，这应该不用我提醒你吧？若是有人打算违逆神皇的意愿，挑战我的神圣特权，那恐怕就太令人遗憾了。”

languages.text: {n}Sonríe burlona.{/n} «Eso tengo que verlo. ¿Debo recordarle que no es {mf|el|la} únic{mf|o|a} que goza de la protección de una {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}? Sería una tragedia que alguien violara mis sagrados privilegios y desafiara la voluntad del Emperador».
languages.original_text: {n}She smiles mockingly.{/n} "That I would like to see. Must I remind you that you are not the only one who is protected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}? It would be a terrible shame if someone were to violate my sacred privileges and scorn His will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sonríe burlona.{/n} «Eso tengo que verlo. ¿Debo recordarle que no es {mf|el|la} únic{mf|o|a} que goza de la protección de una {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}? Sería una tragedia que alguien violara mis sagrados privilegios y desafiara la voluntad del Emperador».

languages.text: « J'aimerais bien voir ça, {n}répond-elle avec un sourire moqueur.{/n} Dois-je vous rappeler que vous n'êtes pas {mf|le seul|la seule} à bénéficier de la protection d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} ? Ce serait fort dommage que qui que ce soit viole mes privilèges sacrés et méprise ainsi Sa volonté. »
languages.original_text: {n}She smiles mockingly.{/n} "That I would like to see. Must I remind you that you are not the only one who is protected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}? It would be a terrible shame if someone were to violate my sacred privileges and scorn His will."

traits.locale_text: « J'aimerais bien voir ça, {n}répond-elle avec un sourire moqueur.{/n} Dois-je vous rappeler que vous n'êtes pas {mf|le seul|la seule} à bénéficier de la protection d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} ? Ce serait fort dommage que qui que ce soit viole mes privilèges sacrés et méprise ainsi Sa volonté. »

languages.text: {n}Sie lächelt spöttisch.{/n} "Das möchte ich sehen. Muss ich Euch daran erinnern, dass nicht nur Ihr von einem {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g} geschützt werdet? Es wäre jammerschade, wenn jemand meine heiligen Privilegien verletzen und Seinen Willen missachten würde."
languages.original_text: {n}She smiles mockingly.{/n} "That I would like to see. Must I remind you that you are not the only one who is protected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}? It would be a terrible shame if someone were to violate my sacred privileges and scorn His will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie lächelt spöttisch.{/n} "Das möchte ich sehen. Muss ich Euch daran erinnern, dass nicht nur Ihr von einem {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g} geschützt werdet? Es wäre jammerschade, wenn jemand meine heiligen Privilegien verletzen und Seinen Willen missachten würde."

languages.text: {n}Alaycı bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Uzaklaştırın da görelim. {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g} ile korunan tek kişi olmadığını hatırlatmama gerek var mı? Kutsal imtiyazlarımı ihlal edilip O'nun iradesinin küçümsenmesi, çok tatsız olurdu."
languages.original_text: {n}She smiles mockingly.{/n} "That I would like to see. Must I remind you that you are not the only one who is protected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}? It would be a terrible shame if someone were to violate my sacred privileges and scorn His will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Alaycı bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "İlginç olurdu. {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g} ile korunan tek kişi olmadığını hatırlatmama gerek var mı? Birinin kutsal imtiyazlarımı ihlâl etmesi ve O'nun iradesini küçümsemesi çok yazık olurdu."
